snippet: The Australian Open winner Stan Wawrinka continued his quest for a fourth title this year by beating Marinko Matosevic, 7-5, 6-3, to reach the semifinal round of the grass-court Queen’s Club tournament, a warm-up event for Wimbledon.
lead_paragraph: The Australian Open winner Stan Wawrinka continued his quest for a fourth title this year by beating Marinko Matosevic, 7-5, 6-3, to reach the semifinal round of the grass-court Queen’s Club tournament, a warm-up event for Wimbledon.
